turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how may i assist you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want to order a coffee in Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what drink do you want to buy from starbucks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not sure what that means. there is grande, venti and tall.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you repeat it for me?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the sizes at starbucks are tall, grande and venti.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can you choose a size please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, tall is enough. Tile is enough.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you have a milk preference for your drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm not sure what you mean.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want sour milk. Can you get it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks has Whole, Nonfat, 2%, Soy, Coconut, and Almond milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not sure which option you're selecting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want a tall Cappuccino with soy milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's right. Yeah, that's right. Yeah, that's what get for me. Yeah.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you want to order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Starbucks on Saratoga Avenue. and it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Goodbye. Have a nice day.
